const tx = await ethers.provider.getTransaction("0xb7eb923b5a9f0717de5042ce035447e9255f23d55cc9f274b0263a71bc6d9d00"); console.log(tx);
const controller = await ethers.getContractAt("IndexTokenController", "0x0E801D84Fa97b50751Dbf25036d067dCf18858bF"); console.log(await controller.INDEX_TOKEN());
const receipt = await ethers.provider.getTransactionReceipt("0xb7eb923b5a9f0717de5042ce035447e9255f23d55cc9f274b0263a71bc6d9d00"); console.log(receipt);
const tx = await ethers.provider.getTransaction("0xb7eb923b5a9f0717de5042ce035447e9255f23d55cc9f274b0263a71bc6d9d00"); console.log(tx);
cd hardhat && npx hardhat run scripts/token/debug-token-creation.ts --network hederaTestnet
.exit
cd hardhat && npx hardhat run scripts/token/debug-token-creation.ts --network hederaTestnet
npx hardhat run scripts/token/debug-token-creation.ts --network hederaTestnet
npx hardhat console --network hederaTestnet
const c = await ethers.getContractAt("IndexTokenController", "0x0E801D84Fa97b50751Dbf25036d067dCf18858bF"); const events = await c.queryFilter("*"); console.log(events);
const c = await ethers.getContractAt("IndexTokenController", "0x0E801D84Fa97b50751Dbf25036d067dCf18858bF"); console.log(c.interface.formatJson());
const contract = await ethers.getContractAt("IndexTokenController", "0x0E801D84Fa97b50751Dbf25036d067dCf18858bF"); console.log(contract.interface.formatJson());
const contract = await ethers.getContractAt("IndexTokenController", "0x0E801D84Fa97b50751Dbf25036d067dCf18858bF"); const filter = contract.filters.TokenCreationResponse(); const logs = await contract.queryFilter(filter); console.log(logs);
const controller = await ethers.getContractAt("IndexTokenController", "0x0E801D84Fa97b50751Dbf25036d067dCf18858bF"); const filter = controller.filters.TokenCreationResponse(); const logs = await controller.queryFilter(filter); console.log(logs);
const tx = await ethers.provider.getTransaction("0xb7eb923b5a9f0717de5042ce035447e9255f23d55cc9f274b0263a71bc6d9d00"); console.log(tx);
const controller = await ethers.getContractAt("IndexTokenController", "0x0E801D84Fa97b50751Dbf25036d067dCf18858bF"); console.log(await controller.INDEX_TOKEN());
const receipt = await ethers.provider.getTransactionReceipt("0xb7eb923b5a9f0717de5042ce035447e9255f23d55cc9f274b0263a71bc6d9d00"); console.log(receipt);
